author: Roxy McCurry
comment: I upgraded my phone to the S8 Active and I can no longer change my watch face. Is there a fix? I used to have an LG phone but ditched them after 20 years.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, the phone and the watch needs to be in sync (use the Android Wear app on phone), and similarly, the Photo Watch 2 app on phone and watch also needs to be in sync. Please contact us if you need help in this area and we will be glad to assist you.

author: Dennis Bareis
comment: It should not need a rocket scientist for such a simple task

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, are you facing any difficulties in using the app? You just need to select a photo from the phone app to send to one of the provided watch faces.

author: Vivek Bawge
comment: Bought App. Selecting photo in the app on phone does not transfer to my wear 2 watch fossil Q wander. I get just 3 options on watch face nature, animal and random. I can't send photo from my gallery. Will refund the money if it doesn't work

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Issues solved (the case is for having both free and paid versions and the wrong watch faces are used - uninstalled the free version solved the issue). Thanks for the updated rating!

author: Curt Alphenaar
comment: I had the free version and liked it so much that I decided upgrade. Photo watch 2 allows you to add interactive tiles so you can access apps from the face. The real reason I like this app is that I feel it allows you to have information on the face without blocking all of your photo background. It's the best of both worlds, an attractive face with everything I need! Nice job!

author: Abdul Majeed MJ
comment: I'm not able to choose my custom photo as watch face there's only 3 options either animal/nature/random 😑

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, you can use the custom photo on your phone. Check instructions here: https://virtualgs.wordpress.com/photo-watch-2/

author: Lee Osenton
comment: Only has analog watch faces but shows analog and digital faces in Google Play. I'm disappointed because I don't want the analog watch hands over my photos.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, it has 3 watch faces. You can select them on the watch itself. One of them is focus on photo, and other 2 are for digital and analog watch faces.

author: Brad Aguilar
comment: I pick my picture and can track my steps with Google fit, even press on the steps icon and boom I'm in the app. Love this app! I had photo watch 1 and this is a great upgrade.

author: John Meshelany Jr.
comment: I can't get the watchface to show both digital and analog time like the old version. Really hope I didn't just waste my money...

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, there are 3 watch faces - digital, analog and photo. If you want to show both digital and analog time, choose the analog watch face, then apply a time complications to it (this is the new feature of Photo Watch 2).

author: Teh Dyzaster
comment: Not bad, but I wish it would allow me to remove the default pictures.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: You can use any picture - just upload from the phone app!

author: Matt Blackmer
comment: Doesn't show the date on the Photo Digital watch face.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: You can use one of the watch complications to show date or other info.

author: ray wallet
comment: Never able to set a custom photo

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: You set up the custom photo on the phone app. Please contact us if you have more questions.

author: Zombie Outbreak Control Center
comment: Wont display images from my gallery  in portrait configuration even after changing it myself. It always displays sideways. Crashes alot.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Can you send us the image to test?

author: Jose Luis Galdamez
comment: This app is excellent battery issue has been fixed loving the complications. Thank you

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thank you! If there is any feature you like so that it can be your 5 stars app let us know!

author: Tom Bowers
comment: Just installed photo watch 2, this app is really nice. Add your photos for the background. There are complications that you can add to the watch face and interact.You can send a message to the watch face and change size, font, color.   Looking forward to more features.

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Thank you! More features are definitely coming, all you have to do is to ask. :)

author: Tom Conger
comment: This app works great once you figure out how to install it on a AW 2.0 with Play Store installed watch. If you allowed Google apps to be duplicated on your watch when you installed AW 2.0, then you have to install it again through the watch Play Store app. It does not charge you money again, it just needs to link both accounts. Works better than the original.

author: Natalie Minton
comment: Does not work! Won't even connect 2 phone nor does app show on watch

reply.author: Virtual GS
reply.content: Hi, are you using Android Wear 2 watch? Please contact us and we will help you on the issues! You can also read the other comments on this issue.

author: DIPTO Rozario MJ
comment: I think it will be a fantastic apps🤗🤗
